## Summary

I am a statistics student at the Federal University of Juiz de Fora, currently in the final period of the program. As a Scientific Initiation Fellow on the social and epidemiological data analysis platform JF Salvando Todos, i have gained experience in automated data collection and cleaning, creating web pages with RShiny, and data analysis and modeling. Also worked with inference and prediction of epidemiological data using time series models, creating the R package **fableCount**.
